mcq.statement: Who were the members of the Cabinet Mission that visited the Subcontinent in 1946 to frame a constitutional structure?

options.a: Pethick Lawrence, Sir Stafford Cripps, and A.V. Alexander
options.b: Lord Mountbatten, Sir Stafford Cripps, and Gandhi
options.c: Pethick Lawrence, Lord Wavell, and Nehru

mcq.one_liner: The Cabinet Mission of 1946, which visited the Subcontinent to propose a constitutional framework, consisted of **Pethick Lawrence, Sir Stafford Cripps, and A.V. Alexander**.
